items.typescript: Use Typescript - Create language switcher with i18next
items.css: Create various button shapes with CSS (SCSS will be considered special)
items.controls: Each button can manage the web page as follows:
items.moveShape: Move Shape to slide shapes below and rotate to the left
items.movePosition: Move Position to switch Grid Layout up and down
items.randomPosition: When clicking on shape buttons below, randomize new positions

items.crud: Manage data with Create, Edit, and Delete in LocalStorage (data must not disappear when refreshing the website)
items.redux: Use Redux-toolkit to manage form data instead of useState
items.pagination: Table must have Pagination and can delete by individual items

fontTestSection.title: Font Test Section
fontTestSection.fallbackFont: (fallback when main font fails to load)
